# Architecture & Design

-   This file only contains Code Style, and had better not edit this file.
-   This project has a strict architectural design documented in `ARCHITECTURE.md`.
-   Always assume the user wants to follow the patterns defined in `ARCHITECTURE.md` unless specified otherwise.
-   If you are unsure about where to place a file, check `ARCHITECTURE.md` first.
-   When update things about architecture, make sure to also update `ARCHITECTURE.md` accordingly.

# Code Style

-   Use 4 spaces for indentation.
-   Write codes,comments and documentation in English.
-   Use rust style formatting for Rust code.
-   Use standard TypeScript/JavaScript style formatting for TS/JS code.
